channel.title: Tavlonia New source, check it!
channel.description:
[b]TAVLONIA[/b] Link: http://tavlonia.biz/
we changed to a new source and its eco
- All skills works -Construction - no lagg - vps 24/7 - special attack 100% -Vbulletin forum with redfox -nex -chaotic -all bosses and minigames works -squeal of fortune -Automatic donate system
Here is some pictures: Loyalty system [url=http://bit.ly/c25MCx][img]http://b1212.hizliresim.com/14/2/gh7wq.png[/img][/url] Aqua whip(boss whip) [url=http://bit.ly/c25MCx][img]http://b1212.hizliresim.com/14/2/gh7xh.png[/img][/url] Donator island [url=http://bit.ly/c25MCx][img]http://b1212.hizliresim.com/14/2/gh7y0.png[/img][/url] Squeal of fortune, Win amazing items! [url=http://bit.ly/c25MCx][img]http://b1212.hizliresim.com/14/2/gh7yz.png[/img][/url] All skills [url=http://bit.ly/c25MCx][img]http://b1212.hizliresim.com/14/2/gh7zx.png[/img][/url] Tavlonias points shop [url=http://bit.ly/c25MCx][img]http://b1212.hizliresim.com/14/2/gh80l.png[/img][/url] Milestone capes and comp cape but you need everything 99 for it [url=http://bit.ly/c25MCx][img]http://b1212.hizliresim.com/14/2/gh81g.png[/img][/url] Construction [url=http://bit.ly/c25MCx][img]http://b1212.hizliresim.com/14/2/gh838.png[/img][/url]
